description: The airline announces it will launch direct flights from Guernsey to Exeter and Birmingham.
title: Aurigny to take over former Flybe routes to Exeter and Birmingham
title_page: Aurigny to take over former Flybe routes to Exeter and Birmingham - BBC News
maintext: Blue Islands is currently offering services to Exeter and Birmingham in the wake of the Flybe collapse and said customers should be "assured of continued service to both of these destinations".
